Bombay Sapphire5mint leaves3oz. premium tonic water1cup granulated sugar1cup raspberries1cup water¾oz. raspberry syrup (recipe follows)½oz. lime juiceRaspberries and a mint sprig, for garnishPreparationStep 1To make raspberry syrup, add 1 cup of water, 1 cup of sugar, and 1 cup of raspberries to a pot. Step 2Bring to a simmer for 3-5 minutes. Allow to cool. Strain off solids.Step 3Gently muddle mint in glass with raspberry syrup and lime juice. Add Bombay Sapphire Gin and top with tonic water. Give a little stir to incorporate mint throughout the drink.Step 4Garnish with raspberry pieces and mint sprigs.Click to Shop Bombay Sapphire NowBE BRILLIANT AND INSPIRED. DRINK RESPONSIBLY!©2021.
